title: Afghanistan Live News: Explosions Near Kabul Airport; Biden Vows Retaliation
content:
1. Afghanistan Live News: Explosions Near Kabul Airport; Biden Vows Retaliation  The New York Times
  2. Taliban says it will no longer allow the evacuation of Afghans as shots fired at Kabul airport  South China Morning Post
  3. Afghanistan news: Latest on blasts reported outside Kabul airport  CNN
  4. Biden warns Kabul airport attackers: 'We will hunt you down'  Reuters
  5. US, UK urge citizens to leave Kabul airport due to terror threat  POLITICO Europe
